descriptions.monthly: Together we save animals from frontline territories. Every donation means warmth, food, and safety.

aboutUs.title: About the Charitable Foundation
aboutUs.modalTitle: To become our partner, leave your contact details

segments.text: was founded on 31.10.2023 by the Nikonchuk family: Oleh and Yevheniia. The foundation helps homeless animals affected by the war and those in frontline areas using the family’s own funds. Due to the constant danger, ensuring their survival is an extremely difficult task. Animals are often left alone with the war, suffering from hunger, cold, disease, and human aggression. The foundation’s mission is to provide animals with medicine, food, vaccinations, sterilization, and most importantly — a chance for rescue and hope for a dignified life.

is to break through people’s indifference and irresponsibility towards animals. People must stop treating animals as objects. This is what humanity truly means. An animal’s life should be valuable to a human! An animal deserves love and safety just as much as a human does!

aboutOwner.title: ABOUT THE CO-FOUNDERS OF THE FOUNDATION

segments.text: The founders of the foundation are the Nikonchuk family. Oleh Nikonchuk is the founder of the IT companies 'Versiya' and 'Navionika', which exclusively represent Garmin, Simrad, Lowrance, B&G, Deeper, and Navico in Ukraine. Evheniia Nikonchuk is a two-time bodybuilding champion of Ukraine, vice-champion of the European fitness tournament FITPARADE. She dedicated 10 years to sports, worked as a fitness trainer, and conducted seminars on nutrition and training.

"Since childhood, I've always loved animals and dreamed of having a dog, but I was never allowed to have one," says Evheniia. Only at the age of 33 did she get her duo: Elsa, a husky, and Boom, a small mixed-breed dog she found on the roadside. "Animals teach us compassion and attentiveness to the weak. In charity, humanity grows," Evheniia says.

Since the start of the full-scale war, Evheniia’s husband has supported the military, while she has focused on animals — the most vulnerable and overlooked group. With family funds, over 5 tons of food and hundreds of medicines, vaccines, and treatments have been sent. But as the number of strays keeps growing, especially near the frontlines, the idea of the 'Tail Angels' Foundation was born — to expand help and unite caring people.
"My mission as a co-founder is to show that animals are part of Ukraine — they are our family. We must be more caring, not only to our pets but also to those without one," says Evheniia.

MonthlyGoalSection.generalGoal: Total goal: {{goal}} UAH for materials and construction.

VolunteeringPage.title: Together we change the world with good deeds
VolunteeringPage.helpTitle: Become a volunteer at the 'Angels of Tails' Foundation
VolunteeringPage.helpSubtitle: Want to help animals and be part of a big good cause? Join the volunteer team of our foundation! We are looking for active, caring people ready to support us in various directions.

formCard.title: Want to become part of the team?
formCard.text: Fill out the form below – and we’ll get in touch with you!

helpsList.title: Volunteer at charity events
paragraphs: Interacting with guests: telling them about the foundation, our mission, and achievements
Escorting people and dogs to photo zones, play areas, and contests
Distributing gifts, flyers, and helping with venue decoration
Photo and video documentation of events, shooting short videos, basic editing
Hosting at locations: photo zone, lottery, contests. Actively engaging guests and guiding them further

helpsList.title: Assistant to the Foundation Director (volunteer position)
paragraphs: Assisting with organizational tasks and work planning
Working with Google Docs: spreadsheets, lists, forms
Preparing thank-you notes for donors and partners (based on templates)
Coordinating volunteers and event participants, maintaining simple lists

helpsList.title: Creative support
paragraphs: Designing layouts for flyers, thank-you cards, and posters
Photo or video editing, creating short social media videos
Generating ideas for upcoming events, photo zone setups, contests (props, decor, creative solutions)

helpsList.title: PR and communications
paragraphs: Finding new partners and donors
Communicating with businesses, shopping centers, bloggers, and media
Connecting with show business: actors, musicians, hosts, influencers
Engaging TV channels and broadcasters to support with media coverage
Negotiating joint campaigns, fundraising, and collaborations
Sending request letters (based on templates) and maintaining communication

whatGet.title: What Does a Volunteer of the 'Tail Angels' Foundation Receive?
whatGet.subtitle: By becoming an angel for those who cannot ask for help, you open new opportunities for yourself as well. Together with the 'Tail Angels' team, we create positive change — with love, care, and inspiration.
paragraphs: Official recognition — thank-you notes, volunteer certificate, recommendations.
Real impact — you personally help save animals’ lives.
Participation in large-scale events — our volunteers join events we organize, as well as city, national, and major themed festivals by invitation of partners and organizers.
Professional growth — new skills, career prospects, and development.
Community and inspiration — connections, emotions, and pride in meaningful work.

list.title: PRACTIK

PartnersSupport.titleMob: Animal support means a new life!
PartnersSupport.titleDesk: Your support gives animals a chance for a new life. Join us!

list.text: Financial support – food, medicine, treatments, vaccines, sterilization, kennel construction, etc.
Material assistance – providing food, medical supplies, animal care items, and other necessary resources.
Volunteering – active involvement of employees and volunteers in charity events and animal support activities.
Informational support – spreading awareness about the foundation's work and attracting new partners and donors.
Social responsibility – building a positive image for your business and demonstrating civic engagement.
Informational support and PR – partner promotion, free publicity, and public acknowledgements.
Transparency and reporting – regular reports on how funds are used.
Outdoor promotion at events – showcasing your products and direct engagement with the audience.

ChairtyEvents.title: Our Charity Events
ChairtyEvents.missionText: Using joy and entertainment to help animals in frontline areas
ChairtyEvents.missionTitleMob: Thanks to you, we held 4 events that changed animals’ lives!
ChairtyEvents.missionTitleDesk: Thanks to your support, we successfully held 4 events, making a positive impact on animals’ lives.
paragraphs: Friends, let’s imagine — what emotions do charity foundations often evoke in us? Sadness, pain, despair... In these difficult times, we are overwhelmed with sorrow, worry, and stress.

Analyzing this, we decided to make charity fun.
It’s a chance to help animals not just through donations, but through participation in exciting events.

Unfortunately, during war it’s very hard to stay positive and joyful — we completely understand. That’s why fundraising is difficult. People are tired of donating, often walk past, indifferent, filled with disappointment and sadness.

list.title: Themed Photo Zone
list.text: We create stylish decorations with costumes for dogs and their owners so guests can take bright photos. A professional photographer captures the best moments of your day.

list.title: Win-Win Lottery
list.text: For a donation, participants receive guaranteed gifts from our partners. A great opportunity to support the cause and receive a pleasant surprise!

list.title: Grooming from the V.O.G DOG salon chain
list.text: A team of female groomers dye the tails' fur, apply glitter tattoos, glue on rhinestones, braid and extend pigtails, trim claws, comb hair, and much more.

list.title: Paintings with Paw and Hand Prints
list.text: Unique souvenirs that will last a lifetime. These paintings will be a lasting reminder of a special day.

list.title: Educational Social Mission
list.text: Raising awareness about stray animals and promoting responsible pet ownership.

benefits.title: Benefits of Our Charity Initiatives
benefits.subtitle: Together we can do more! Join our events and become part of the big kind family ‘Tail Angels’!
list: Genuine emotions and trust – we create a joyful atmosphere where guests get to know the foundation and see our work.
Educational social mission – at our events, we talk about the problem of stray animals, involving experts to spread a culture of responsible care.
Balance of fun and help – gifts, contests, and lotteries make the events fun and motivate people to help those in need.
Bringing together caring people – people return, become volunteers and friends of the foundation, strengthening our community.
Promoting partners – we collaborate with pet product manufacturers, give away prizes, and help brands connect with audiences through good deeds.
Official support – our events are supported by the Obolon District Administration, and we aim to expand them to other districts of Kyiv.

donate.title: Become an Angel – Give Hope.
donate.text: Your support changes lives! Support the Tail Angels and give a chance for a better future.

helpAnimal.title: Helping Animals Together is Easy!
helpAnimal.subtitle: How businesses can help:
helpAnimal.text: Support the foundation as a company, blogger, or volunteer – everyone can make a difference!
